thread.title: Tech billionaire issues stark warning to human race saying artificial intellgence could DESTROY human race which is already ‘part cyborg’ because of its dependence on smartphones
thread.title_full: Tech billionaire issues stark warning to human race saying artificial intellgence could DESTROY human race which is already ‘part cyborg’ because of its dependence on smartphones

author: znauman
title: Tech billionaire issues stark warning to human race saying artificial intellgence could DESTROY human race which is already ‘part cyborg’ because of its dependence on smartphones
text:
Opinion END OF THE WORLD AS WE KNOW IT Tech billionaire issues stark warning to human race saying artificial intellgence could DESTROY human race which is already ‘part cyborg’ because of its dependence on smartphones 
The creative genius added a ‘universal income’ would have to be introduced for the global population because robots will do everything By Zoe Nauman US Online Reporter 16th February 2017, 11:50 pm
